In the Azores, the weather can change quickly. If rain or wind catches you by surprise, our team will help you relocate your tent or find temporary shelter. We also have covered areas and rental waterproof gear to ensure your stay remains comfortable and safe.
If you have any issues with the electrical connection or water supply, let us know through the app or at the reception. Our technical team is available 24 hours to resolve it as soon as possible.

Have you lost something important? We have a lost and found service. You just need to register the item in the app or notify the reception. If it is documentation, we will help you contact the local authorities.
The safety of our guests comes first. We have a first aid kit and staff trained in basic first aid. In the event of a serious emergency, we will help you quickly contact the nearest medical services.

To ensure everyone\'s peace, the campsite has mandatory quiet hours. If noise from other campers is bothering you, please notify us via the app or at reception. We will intervene discreetly so you can enjoy your rest without interruptions.
